pages.text: On [$(k:use)], the $(item)Teleposition Sigil$() will transport the player to a linked Teleposer.$(br2)To link the $(item)Teleposition Sigil$() to a Teleposer, [$(k:sneak)] + [$(k:use)] the sigil on the Teleposer.$(br2)The $(item)Teleposition Sigil$() is capable of transporting the player between dimensions,
though at a higher $(blood)LP$() cost.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$()$(li)$(blood)1,000 LP$()/use intra-dimension$(li)$(blood)10,000 LP$()/use inter-dimension

pages.soulforge.heading: Teleposition Reagent
pages.array.heading: Teleposition Sigil
pages.array.text: $(italic)I am very close to being moved by this.$()
